articles.title: Blue Jays’ Guerrero Jr., Semien, Ray among finalists for American League Awards - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Vladimir Guerrero Jr., and Marcus Semien gave the Toronto Blue Jays two of the three finalists for the American League MVP and Robbie Ray is up for the Cy Young Award while Charlie Montoyo finished out of the top three in manager of the year balloting.
articles.content: CARLSBAD, Calif. Vladimir Guerrero Jr., and Marcus Semien gave the Toronto Blue Jays two of the three finalists for the American League MVP and Robbie Ray is up for the Cy Young Award while Charlie M… [+3023 chars]

articles.title: North American stock markets continue record runs after last week's economic gains - Business News - Castanet.net
articles.description: The afterglow of last week's economic and employment gains propelled North American stock markets further along their record runs.
articles.content:
The afterglow of last week's economic and employment gains propelled North American stock markets further along their record runs.
